com.cs301w01.meatload.model.querygenerators

Class PictureQueryGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs301w01.meatload.model.querygenerators.QueryGenerator
      • com.cs301w01.meatload.model.querygenerators.PictureQueryGenerator

  • public class PictureQueryGenerator
extends QueryGenerator
    Creates queries dealing with Pictures in the database.

    Converts values from the database to usable data by the rest of the application.

    Author:
    Derek Dowling

    • Method Detail

      • updatePictureByID

        public void updatePictureByID(Picture p)
        Takes a Picture object and pushes it to the database. Note: this function does not update the tags, Use addTagsToPicture and deleteTagsFromPicture in tagQueryGenerator for this
        Parameters:
        p - Picture object to be pushed to database
        id - ID value
